footer.p_8: We are a young company always looking for new and creative ideas to help you with our products in your everyday work.

car-select.l_25: You will be charged per km driven at the end of the trip.
car-select.l_27: You will not be reimbursed for fuel expenses.
car-select.l_28: You must return the vehicle with the same amount of fuel as when picked up

cardetail.p_27: Note:The image is for representation purpose only. The colour of the actual car may vary
cardetail.p_59: There is no travel limit. ₹ 2/km distance charge will be applied over the booking amount. Fuel bills are not reimbursed in this package.
cardetail.l_163: Please carry your original driving license along with an additional id proof when you come to pick up your car
cardetail.l_171: Our cars have a maximum speed limit of 120 km/h. Over speeding will attract fines
cardetail.l_174: Our cars have a maximum speed limit of 120 km/h. Over speeding will attract fines
cardetail.s_228: You are just one step away from confirming your booking. Confirm that you are above 18 and you agree to all the terms mentioned in

upload-file.l_25: Upload clear front and back images of the original driving license
upload-file.l_26: Photo, license number and date of birth should be clearly visible
upload-file.l_27: A valid 4 wheeler license is must to drive a car and a valid 2 wheeler to drive a bike
upload-file.l_28: Learner's license is not a valid government ID proof
upload-file.l_29: Once a license is linked to an account, it cannot be modified.

payment.p_179: Do you really want to delete these records? This process cannot be undone.

baners.p_71: We simplified car rentals, so you can focus on what's important to you
baners.p_84: Don't worry about mileage! All fuel costs are included. If you refill fuel, we'll pay you back!
baners.p_92: Our prices include taxes and insurance.What you see is what you really pay!
baners.p_102: One size never fits all! Choose a balance of time and kilometers that works best for you.
baners.p_110: Our cars have all-Tunisia permits. Just remember to pay state tolls and entry taxes.
baners.p_118: We have round-the-clock, pan Tunisia partners. Help is never far away from you.
baners.p_126: All your bookings include damage insurance! Drive safe, but don’t worry!
baners.p_188: Drive yourself to an adventure and back in 5 simple steps
baners.p_203: Search for and book a car on our site!
baners.p_215: Upload your driver’s license, and pay a small security deposit.
baners.p_224: We mail your car details 20 minutes before pickup.
baners.p_235: Fill the start checklist. Grab the keys from the glove-box and drive.
baners.p_245: Return the car to the same location and fill the end checklist to end your trip
